data.eml:eml: Apoxyria hirtuosa (Wiedemann, 1821) comb. n., lectotype designation, redescription and identification key to species of Apoxyria Schiner, 1866 (Asilidae, Laphriinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alvim, Edgar, Ale-Rocha, Rosaly, Bravo, Freddy (2011): Apoxyria hirtuosa (Wiedemann, 1821) comb. n., lectotype designation, redescription and identification key to species of Apoxyria Schiner, 1866 (Asilidae, Laphriinae). ZooKeys 125: 51-57, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.125.1790, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.125.1790
